alert.note: Alert for Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 9:09PM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Southwest Big Horn Basin, Southeast Big Horn Basin and Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains. * WHEN...Through 5 PM Wednesday. The heaviest snow will occur through 2 AM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially through the Wind River Canyon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As of 8 PM, Thermopolis has had around 1 inch of snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions go to wyoroad.info or call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin
